manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SALAV GS49-DJ Professional Dual Bar Garment Steamer with Stainless Steel Nozzle and Foot Pedal Controls The SALAV Professional Garment Steamer GS49-DJ features a unique stainless steel plated nozzle and dual telescopic bar support for added stability and to protect against tilting. The stainless steelplated nozzle helps deliver hot steam and provides extra pressing power to steam out those wrinkles. The powerful 1500 wattGS49-DJ has convenient power & steam setting pedals that are ergonomically located for easy access. The fashion forward GS49-DJ also contains SALAV patented features including a multifunctional hanger and a double insulated hose to maintain steam temperature and regulate hose surface heat. The GS49-DJ garment steamer also has an easy-to-fill removable translucent water tank with 1.8L capacity to provide continuous steam for up to 60 minutes and heats up in just 45 seconds. Included accessories: Mini Ironing Paddle, Pants Press Attachment, Hanger Clips, Fabric Brush.

Product Features Has convenient power & steam setting pedals that are ergonomically located for easy access Includes a multifunctional hanger and a double insulated hose to maintain steam temperature and regulate hose surface heat. The stainless steel steam nozzle makes removing wrinkles faster and more efficient.

Mini Ironing Paddle Perfect took to help straighten collars, cuffs, and more. Hanger Clips Clip and steam garments, fabrics, plush toys, and more. Pants Press Steam press your pants to make straight trouser line. Fabric Brush Helps remove pet hair, lint, and allows steam to better penetrate the fabric.
Retractable Power Cord Comes with a retractable power cord for mess-free storage.

Product Specifications Steam Ready Time 45 sec Water Tank Capacity 1.8 L Steam Time 60 mins Hanger Type 60 mins Hanger Type Dual Wide Bar Wattage 1500 watts Voltage 110V-120V Hose Type Dual Insulated Included Accessories Pants Press, Fabric Brush, Mini Ironing Paddle, 2 Hanger Clips

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must Have for every home
reviews.reviewText: dare I say that this device make me lazy, but I no longer use an iron on many of my articles of clothing. I have owned in the past a portable, handheld steamer, that was very poor in performance. And the first time I used a steamer of this quality was this past February on a cruise ship. I ordered the steamer in order to take the wrinkles out of dresses, but otherwise could not be ironed. I am now using it daily for near everything that I wear plus linens. The unit heats up fairly quickly. The only downside is that it does not get tall enough to hold a full length gown that I may be able to steam from top to bottom. I love the retractable cord and it’s compact ability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have an in home boutique , which this professional steamer makes it easy to prepare my clothes for trying on.It assembles easy any is very efficient !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and does a great job.
reviews.reviewText: It works consistently well, and after just a few uses the hose becomes flexible and it gets easier. It produces a good amount of steam and quickly. Ive had zero leaks the past few months. It even comes with a mini ironing pad good for collars and pockets.My only complaint is that the clips are absolutely usless. They can't hang anything heavier than a sock and they can't keep clothing clipped together to get specific folds. You are better off using a chip bag clip. But don't think you can use these clips for a bag of chips. Too weak. This is why I'm giving it four stars instead of five. As long as you only intend steam clothing by hand or on a hanger, this is a must buy, as your stuff will turn out great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice design/low quality
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steamer because the way it looked but it didn’t work as advertised. I got a handheld steamer right after to compare and it worked a lot better and faster, this product introduced itself as a professional steamer but it took lots of time or forever to remove wrinkles and it gave up on the stubborn ones. I paid $136 for this and not worth it , spent $35 on the handheld one and found it more effective and useful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I love the look of this steamer. I don't have to tuck it away in my closet, because it looks so nice in my bedroom. Most importantly, this steamer works great - smoothing out the wrinkles of my many cotton and linen blouses. I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not better than cheaper options
reviews.reviewText: Cheaper option this was meant to replace has more intensive and faster heat. No wonder why the discount now. Foot pedals, retractile cable are a good features though. The finish is actually premium so it looks good.
